name: Village (lazinessgames, Ataque do Dev, altctrl, Lushir)
name_original: Village (lazinessgames, Ataque do Dev, altctrl, Lushir)
description:
Don't Trust Anyone! Discover who is the monster, and prepare to run!

Controls:

  • WASD - Move your character.
  • Mouse - Aim your flashlight.
  • F - Turn On/Off the flashlight
  • E - Save someone!

Game made for the PodquestJam 2021 with the theme: It isn't what looks like

It was made by 3 junior game developers (all programmers) in 15 days and much coffee!

We hope you have more fun than bugs playing it and really appreciate your feedback!

Thanks for the support and enjoy!
